name: Hijri Calendar Widget
author: Fethi Bendimerad

sections.description:
This plugin’s aim is to help with calendar conversions from gregorian dates to hijri dates and vice-versa.

Some of the features:

  • instant conversion of Gregorian Dates to Hijri Dates
  • Light weight widget
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload wp-plugin-hijri-calendar.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Will there be additional features to this plugin?

Yes, Soon there will be a calaendar as well as the inverted conversion and other cool things.

How can you verify it accuracy?

I have some historical books that I cannot wait to share with eveyone, although there was always in history incoherent conversions.
